title: Enhancing Customer Experience Practical Competencies: Collaborative Inquiry Learning Design Based on Nordic TEL (Technology-Enhanced Learning)

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can implement three or more lesson designs utilizing collaborative inquiry learning models in VR simulation environments.
Learners can develop tool-based strategies to enhance digital literacy and improve learner engagement by over 20%.
Learners can produce one or more instructional materials by applying a TEL design framework—based on Nordic educational examples—to real job contexts.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
